text:
May 12, 1961
Mrs. Liliam D. Plante
Office of Reports
Ford Foundation
477 Madison Avenue
New York 22, New York
Dear Mrs. Plante:
If it is not too late, we have several additional names which
we would appreciate being included on the mailing of the report
on educational television.
Mrs. Irene R. Saliman
1531 Lowell Blvd.
Denver 4, Colorado
Mr. Frank Traylor
414 14th Street
Denver 2, Colorado
Mrs. Lois Babbitt Heath
2212 Ash
Denver 7, Colorado
Mr. Francis M. Bain
524 Security Life Building
810 14th Street
Denver 2, Colorado
Mr. Palmer L. Burch
226 Majestic Bldg.
209 16th Street
Denver 2, Colorado
Mr. Isadore Samuels
620 Petroeum Club Bldg.
110 16th Street
Denver 2, Colorado
Governor Steve McNichols
State Capitol Building
Denver 2, Colorado
Dr. Byron W. Hansford
Commissioner of Education
State of Colorado
Denver 2, Colorado
Mr. Del Carnes
Television Editor
The Denver Post
Denver, Colorado
Mr. Lloyd King, President
King Soopers, Inc.
1400 West Third Avenue
Denver, Colorado
Thank you very much for your kind attention to this.
Sincerely yours.
m
Mary Elizabeth Me11vane
Administrative Assistant
